--- named_schemas_drop_sequence.sql
DROP SEQUENCE sch1.sequence
--- AST
&ast.DropSequence{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: false,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 14,
        NameEnd: 18,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 19,
        NameEnd: 27,
        Name:    "sequence",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP SEQUENCE sch1.sequence
